Trademarks, trade names and patents, net of accumulated amortization of $647 and $625 at October 31, 2024 and July 31, 2024, respectively
Trademarks and patents, net

The total amount, net of amortization, as of the balance sheet date for 1) the rights acquired through registration of a trademark to gain or protect exclusive use of a business name, symbol or other device or style for a projected indefinite period of benefit and 2) costs pertaining to the exclusive legal rights granted to the owner of the patent to exploit an invention or a process for a period of time specified by law.
